title: why do i not have the weekly champion rotation champions
body:
And because of that my whole game is flashing.
Please Fix it riot games
:) :) :) :) :)
lol

replies.body: New accounts provide a special set of champions with straightforward abilities to help ease new players into the game.  Information on this can be found in our [Choosing the Right Champion ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752864-Choosing-the-Right-Champion#h4q1)guide.  The normal weekly rotation will appear upon reaching level 6.  Hope that helps!
